subject: Re: [junit] Passing argument to main() through JUnit TestCase
msgSnippet: ... you can use the PropertyManager of the JUnit-addons package.  I will add a new method setProperty for the upcoming release (this week-end). -Vladimir --
messageBody:
> I would like to know if is there way to pass an argument to my
> program main() method which takes a single argument to run through
> Junit TestCase.

you can use the PropertyManager of the JUnit-addons package. I will add a new
method 'setProperty' for the upcoming release (this week-end).

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
